body_html:
https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-mac-os-x/index.html

You need to download Command_Line_Tools_macOS_10.13_for_Xcode_9.2.dmg from https://developer.apple.com/download/more/ and install then execute sudo xcode-select --switch /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools
body_text:
https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-mac-os-x/index.html
You need to download Command_Line_Tools_macOS_10.13_for_Xcode_9.2.dmg from https://developer.apple.com/download/more/ and install then execute sudo xcode-select --switch /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools
body:
https://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-installation-guide-mac-os-x/index.html

You need to download Command_Line_Tools_macOS_10.13_for_Xcode_9.2.dmg from https://developer.apple.com/download/more/ and install then execute `sudo xcode-select --switch /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools`
